item.title: ニューヨークタイムズ、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比4.3％増の560.7M、デジタル購読者は同8％増の19万人、合計970万人、印刷購読者は同10％減の710K (Benjamin Mullin/New York Times)
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
The New York Times reports Q1 revenue up 4.3% YoY to $560.7M, digital subscribers up 8% YoY to 190K, for 9.7M total, and print subscribers down 10% to 710K  —  The increase was driven in part by subscriptions to a bundle of products that includes The Athletic sports site …

item.title: AFP通信社に勤務していたフランス人ジャーナリストのアルマン・ソルディン氏が、ウクライナ東部の都市バクムート付近でロシアのロケット弾による攻撃を受けて死亡した（Luke Harding/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Luke Harding / The Guardian:
French journalist Arman Soldin, who worked for the AFP news agency, was killed in a Russian rocket strike near the eastern Ukrainian city of Bakhmut  —  AFP video coordinator Arman Soldin, 32, who was ‘totally dedicated to his craft’, died in attack near Bakhmut

item.title: 英国のLGBTQ+ジャーナリスト40名とメディア関係者6名を対象にした調査：76%がメディア組織がハラスメントから適切に保護していないと回答、82%がトローリングに直面したことがある（Kevin Rawlinson/The Guardian)
item.description:
Kevin Rawlinson / The Guardian:
A survey of 40 UK LGBTQ+ journalists and six media workers: 76% say media organizations don't adequately protect them from harassment, 82% have faced trolling  —  Most respondents report receiving online abuse and harassment, with many seeing their role as dangerous

item.title: 情報源: 国が支援するSaudi Research and Media Groupは、Al Jazeeraに対抗しうる国際的な英語ニュースチャンネルの立ち上げを検討している (Financial Times)
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: state-backed Saudi Research and Media Group is exploring launching an international English-language news channel that could rival Al Jazeera  —  Gulf kingdom aims to expand its media influence around the world  —  A Saudi Arabia state-backed media group is looking at launching …

item.title: 2001年以来、CPJは、1年前のShireen Abu Aklehの殺害を含め、イスラエル国防軍による少なくとも20件のジャーナリスト殺害を記録している（Jennifer Dunham/Committee to Protect ...）
item.description:
Jennifer Dunham / Committee to Protect Journalists:
Since 2001, CPJ has documented at least 20 journalist killings by Israel Defense Forces, including that of Shireen Abu Akleh a year ago; no one has been charged  —  The May 11, 2022, killing of Al-Jazeera Arabic correspondent Shireen Abu Akleh is part of a deadly, decades-long pattern.

item.title: 投資家との対話で、フォックスのラクラン・マードックCEOは、ドミニオンの偽の主張について謝罪しなかった。批評家は、謝罪しないマードックの伝統がフォックスを犠牲にするかもしれないと言う（David Folkenflik/NPR）
item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
In talking with investors, Fox CEO Lachlan Murdoch did not apologize for bogus Dominion claims; critics say the Murdoch tradition of no apologies could cost Fox  —  Fox News' abrupt firing of star Tucker Carlson has caused such an uproar over the past two weeks that it has obscured profound questions …

item.title: BuzzFeed、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比27%減の$67.2M、純損失は同19%減の$36.3M、ジョナ・ペレッティCEOはAI実験とクリエイターとの連携にコミット（Robert Carnevale/The Wrap）
item.description:
Robert Carnevale / The Wrap:
BuzzFeed reports Q1 revenue down 27% YoY to $67.2M and net loss down 19% YoY to $36.3M; CEO Jonah Peretti commits to AI experiments and working with creators  —  The media company predicted a rocky report back in March, and sure enough, revenue fell 27% year-over-year

item.title: Twitterのビデオで、Tucker CarlsonがFoxの番組をソーシャルネットワークで再開すると発言、Elon MuskがTwitterは「いかなる種類の契約も」結んでいないと発言（Washington Post)
item.description:
Washington Post:
In a Twitter video, Tucker Carlson says he will relaunch his Fox show on the social network; Elon Musk says Twitter did not sign a deal “of any kind whatsoever”  —  The former Fox News host tweeted a video saying he's moving his show to the social media site.

item.title: イーロン・マスク氏は、Twitterはタッカー・カールソン氏と「いかなる種類の」契約も結んでおらず、彼はすべてのコンテンツクリエイターと同じルールに従うと述べた（Elon Musk/@elonmusk）
item.description:
Elon Musk / @elonmusk:
Elon Musk said Twitter has not signed a deal “of any kind whatsoever” with Tucker Carlson and he will be subject to the same rules as all content creators  —  @EdKrassen @TuckerCarlson On this platform, unlike the one-way street of broadcast, people are able to interact, critique and refute whatever he or anyone may say. And, of course, anything misleading will get @CommunityNotes. I also want to be clear that we have not signed a deal of any kind... https://twitter.com/...

item.title: Twitterの動画です：タッカー・カールソンは、国民に嘘をついているとされる従来のメディアを非難し、ツイッターを言論の自由を認める最後の大きなプラットフォームと呼んでいる（CNBC）。
item.description:
CNBC:
Twitter video: Tucker Carlson berates traditional media for allegedly lying to the public and calls Twitter the last big platform left that allows free speech  —  - Tucker Carlson, weeks after being fired from his prime time spot on Fox News, said he is relaunching his show on Twitter.

item.title: ドキュメントTucker CarlsonがFox Newsに詐欺と契約違反を訴えた。情報源：Foxの取締役がDominionの和解の一環としてCarlsonに解雇を告げた（Axios）。
item.description:
Axios:
Docs: Tucker Carlson accused Fox News of fraud and breach of contract; sources: a Fox board member told Carlson he was fired as part of the Dominion settlement  —  Tucker Carlson, two weeks after being ousted by Fox News, accused the network Tuesday of fraud and breach of contract …

item.title: FBIは5月8日、かつてGawker、Abrams Media、Deadspin、The Daily Beastで働いたビデオ編集者、Timothy Burkeの自宅で捜索令状を執行した（Matthew Keys/The Desk）。
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
The FBI executed a search warrant on May 8 at the home of Timothy Burke, a video editor who once worked at Gawker, Abrams Media, Deadspin, and The Daily Beast  —  A law enforcement source confirms the former video editor, who now runs his own communications firm, is the target of a criminal investigation.

item.title: タッカー・カールソンは、元フォックス・ニュースのスタッフの協力を得て、Twitterで番組を再スタートさせると発表した。
item.description:
Dylan Byers / @dylanbyers:
Tucker Carlson says he will relaunch his show on Twitter with help from ex-Fox News staff; he'd forgo at least $25M Fox owes him to break a non-compete clause  —  🚨 NEWS: Tucker Carlson will relaunch his show *on Twitter* with help from former Fox News staff. He will forgo at least $25 million owed to him by Fox Corp. in order to break non-compete clause. @PuckNews

item.title: MTVニュースは、Showtime、MTV Entertainment Studios、Paramount Mediaが、Paramount+ With Showtimeのリブランディング後、米国内のスタッフを〜25％削減し、閉鎖される（Jennifer Maas/Variety）。
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
MTV News is shutting down, as Showtime, MTV Entertainment Studios, and Paramount Media cut ~25% of their US staff, after the Paramount+ With Showtime rebranding  —  Layoffs will be hitting 25% of employees across the Showtime, MTV Entertainment Studios and Paramount Media Networks groups in the U.S. Tuesday …

item.title: 陪審は、ドナルド・トランプが作家のE・ジーン・キャロルを性的虐待し中傷した責任を認め、彼女の民事訴訟で500万ドルを授与したが、彼女のレイプ疑惑については認めなかった（NBCニュース）。
item.description:
NBC News:
A jury finds Donald Trump liable for sexually abusing and defaming writer E. Jean Carroll, awarding her $5M in her civil lawsuit, but not for her alleged rape  —  Carroll sued the former president, accusing him of battery over an alleged rape in the 1990s and of defamation for calling her account a “hoax.”
